info.description:
ðŸ¥³ Welcome to the HoudiniSwap OpenAPI guide.

ðŸ“– For a detailed Developer Guide and overview of the API, you can check out our Gitbook here.

ðŸ“¥ Import to Postman:

  1. Download the Postman collection: /api/postman.json
  2. Open Postman and click Import
  3. Choose File and upload the downloaded collection, or use the URL import option

Please note:

  • Authorization Header syntax is ApiKey:ApiSecret
  • For GraphQL api, use /graphql
  • For support on any specific Exchange, please have your users contact our 24/7 support t.me/HoudiniSwapSupport_Bot
info.title: HoudiniSwap

amount.name: amount
amount.description: The amount which the client is willing to transfer

from.name: from
from.description: The TokenID of a currency the client will transfer

to.name: to
to.description: The TokenID of a currency the client will receive

receiverTag.name: receiverTag
receiverTag.description: The destination tag/memo of the receiving address

anonymous.name: anonymous
anonymous.description: Anonymous / Non-anonymous flow. For Anonymous, it will go through a `XMR` route

walletId.name: walletId
walletId.description: *Account ID - The commissions Account ID, users can create one at https://staking.houdiniswap.com/

ip.name: ip
ip.description: User IP address. Used for fraud prevention only

userAgent.name: userAgent
userAgent.description: User userAgent browser string. Used for fraud prevention only

timezone.name: timezone
timezone.description: User browser timezone. Used for fraud prevention only

useXmr.name: useXmr
useXmr.description: Use XMR if it is true or if it is false use another token for the anonymous transaction for the quote or exchange.

filters.name: filters
filters.description: Array of swap shortNames to get quotes from. If provided, quotes from these swaps will be used.

memoNeeded.description: Network requires a memo/extra id field

addressValidation.description: Network address validator, will return a regex string

example.name: Tether
example.keyword: usdt usdterc20 tether usdteth erc-20 erc20 eth

useXmr.description: Use XMR if it is true or if it is false use another token for the anonymous transaction for the quote or exchange.

duration.description: Duration of the exchange in minutes

senderAddress.description: Address (of the deposit) to which the transfer will have to be made

receiverAddress.description: Address where the client will receive payment

anonymous.description: Anonymous / Non-anonymous flow. For Anonymous, it will go through a XMR route

expires.description: Deposit must be made before this date/time

status.description:
Order status:
								NEW: -1,
								WAITING: 0,
								CONFIRMING: 1,
								EXCHANGING: 2,
								ANONYMIZING: 3,
								FINISHED: 4,
								EXPIRED: 5,
								FAILED: 6,
								REFUNDED: 7
                                DELETED: 8

inAmount.description: The amount that the client specified when creating the exchange

inSymbol.description: The CEX TokenID of a currency the client will transfer

outAmount.description: The amount that will be returned by the exchange to the specified receiverAddress

outSymbol.description: The CEX TokenID of a currency the client will receive

outToken.name: Tether
outToken.keyword: usdt usdterc20 tether usdteth erc-20 erc20 eth

inToken.name: BNB
inToken.keyword: BNB BNB Binance Smart Chain evm BNB BNB bsc Binance Smart Chain

totalTransactedUSD.description: Total value in USD at the time of the swap

anonymous.description: Total transactions that are anonymous(out of the total count)

logoUrl.description: Logo URL for the swap provider

markupSupported.description: Whether this swap provider supports markup

txUrl.description: Transaction URL base for tracking swaps

enabled.description: Whether the swap provider is enabled

isDex.description: Whether this is a DEX (true) or CEX (false)

get.summary:
Get the list of available tokens for exchange
            (partner.tokens)

Get the list of available swap providers
            (partner.swaps)
get.description: Returns all enabled swap providers (CEX and DEX) that are supported by the platform. Use the `shortName` field to identify swap providers in other endpoints.

get.summary:
Get the list of available networks/chains
            (partner.networks)
get.description: Use the `shortName` field as the chain parameter in other endpoints like `/dexTokens` and `shortNameV1` field for `CEX` endpoints.

get.summary:
Performs a quote and returns the best price for the swap pair
            (partner.quote)

404.description: 404 response for status request, Order not found

get.summary:
Get the partner weekly volume stats
            (partner.weeklyVolume)

200.description: Get the partner weekly volume stats

schema.description: An array of two numbers representing min and max

post.summary:
Returns a list of required token approve data for dex/route. To be polled until empty list is returned.
            (partner.dexApprove)

step.description: Step number in the signature sequence

totalSteps.description: Total number of steps in the signature process

isComplete.description: Whether the signature process is complete

tokenIdFrom.description: Token identifier from which the swap is initiated

tokenIdTo.description: Token identifier to which the swap is directed

addressFrom.description: Address from which the amount will be deducted

usePermit.description: Whether to use permit instead of approve. Defaults to true for swaps that support it.

post.summary:
Returns the next signature requirement in a chain. To be recursively called, signed, and fed into the next call until isComplete comes back as true. Only to be called when a signature returned by approve call is of type CHAINED
            (partner.chainSignatures)

step.description: Step number in the signature sequence

totalSteps.description: Total number of steps in the signature process

isComplete.description: Whether the signature process is complete

tokenIdFrom.description: Token identifier from which the swap is initiated

tokenIdTo.description: Token identifier to which the swap is directed

addressFrom.description: Address from which the amount will be deducted

key.description: Key that was returned from approve/chainSignature calls

swapRequiredMetadata.description: Additional metadata required for the swap

previousSignature.description: Previous signature object in the chain sequence

signatureKey.description: Key for the signature in the chain

signatureStep.description: Step number in the signature chain sequence

get.summary:
Returns the list of available tokens.
            (partner.dexTokens)

Returns an estimated swap value, min/max
            (partner.dexQuote)

parameters.name: tokenIdFrom
parameters.description: Id of the token from which the swap is initiated

parameters.name: tokenIdTo
parameters.description: Id of the token to which the swap is directed

post.summary:
Executes an exchange using provided parameters and path. Returns the exchange object with the status. metadata field contains the transaction data.
            (partner.dexExchange)

Confirms a DEX transaction with the provided transaction hash
            (partner.dexConfirmTx)

txHash.description: The transaction hash to confirm. Optional for offChain=true orders.

post.summary:
Checks if the allowance is enough for the swap
            (partner.dexHasEnoughAllowance)

200.description: Returns boolean indicating if allowance is sufficient
